transcript:
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Main wo call important hai to main main call a raha hai aap call receive kar lijiye jaldi se.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Okay. Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji bataiye.
Customer: Haan ji sir very good afternoon main Vidhi baat kar rahi thi Sumit ke manager kaise hain sir?
Executive: Haan. Main theek hoon.
Customer: Haan ji actually aapko concern aaya tha location se related ek.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: To humne aapka google direction wala jo location tha wo to update kara diya within 24 hours wo aapko visible ho jayega waha pe.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Right. Second jo aapka concern tha ki aapko jo apna address hai wo short mein mention karana hai yaha pe right?
Customer: Matlab to us jaise Sumit ne mujhe bataya tha na ki aapka jo address hai ha to uske liye na sir aapko pehle ha exactly uske liye na pehle aapko GST mein update karana padega sir.
Customer: Ji ji.
Customer: To aap jaise GST mein aapko to time lagega.
Executive: Okay okay jab bhi hota hai na aap Sumit ko share kar dijiyega to same time pe hum aapko ye update kara denge.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai iske alava koi concern hai aapka sir? Haan ji.
Customer: Haan ji abhi main baat hi kar raha tha Sumit sir se ye cheez hai ki google business ka jo link hai wo yaha par enable nahi ho raha hai theek hai aur ek hai ki mera jo website hai website ka bhi matlab jo main jab click kar raha h na website input kiya hua hai fir main jab click kar raha hu to dusra koi like India mart ka hi kuch aur ek page aa raha hai theek hai matlab jaise aapki jo website aapne yaha pe mention karai hai wwwsatvagiri.com right?
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Haan. Haan.
Executive: Sir jab aap click kar rahe ho to page not found aa raha hai.
Customer: Page not found aa raha hai matlab yaha par likha hua aa raha hai isme main batata hu. Don't worry just take your URL properly or else go to India mart home page theek hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Aur India mart ke browse by categories ki categories dikha raha hai matlab ye matlab h matlab kuch alag hi dikha raha hai matlab proper website.
Executive: Ek kam karte hain ek kam karte hain main ek video meeting ka link aapko share kar rahi hoon theek hai aap ek bar join karo video meeting ek link share kar rahi hoon main aapko theek hai aap ek bar join kijiye so dono cheeze hum ek bar dekh lete hain aapki.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai ha. Mail check kijiye maine link share kar diya aapko.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants address to be in short form.

- Google business link is not enabling.

- Website link is redirecting to another page.



Resolution:

- Informed to update GST for short address.

- Executive shared a video meeting link.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- google business, website, address, gst
